problem.markdown: The basic difference between a PLC and a relay logic is that ( ) Different types of input/outputs devices are used ( ) Different voltage levels for inputs/outputs are use (x) One can be programmed other not
problem.p: The basic difference between a PLC and a relay logic is that

choicegroup.choice: Different types of input/outputs devices are used
Different voltage levels for inputs/outputs are use
One can be programmed other not
